titles.title: For the relief of Commander Carl D. Swanson.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/15/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual as compensation for full settlement of all claims against the United States for injuries resulting from an uncorrected accounting and wage payment error acknowledged by the Coast Guard.
